system.description:
You continue to experiment with the supernatural blood and how to best use it in concert with your nature magic. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your druid levels count as bloodblade levels for the purpose of the Dyscracia feature.
  • Half your bloodblade levels count as druid levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l3qkjox9faldupcy]{Druidic Lore} feature.
  • Half your druid levels count as bloodblade levels for the purpose of the Extra Attack and Sanguine Reach features. 
  • You gain proficiency with your choice of either the Tooth and Claw or Vicious Vein combat tradition and learn a maneuver of a degree you could learn from the selected tradition. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
  • You become especially proficient at causing blood loss. Whenever you score a critical hit with a melee attack that deals piercing or slashing damage, the target takes 1d6 points of ongoing damage for the next minute, or until an action is spent to stanch the flow of blood. If a creature is already suffering from this effect when it triggers, the duration is reset, but the damage does not increase.
